nhc_headline: ...RECON FINDS TINY OSCAR A HURRICANE... ...HURRICANE WARNING ISSUED FOR TURKS AND CAICOS ISLANDS AND SOUTHEAST BAHAMAS...
summary:
...RECON FINDS TINY OSCAR A HURRICANE... ...HURRICANE WARNING ISSUED FOR TURKS AND CAICOS ISLANDS AND SOUTHEAST BAHAMAS...
 As of 2:00 PM EDT Sat Oct 19
 the center of Oscar was located near 21.4, -70.6
 with movement W at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 989 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.
